"Corrupted body" redirects here. For corrupted bodies obtained in The Corrupted Gauntlet, see corrupted body (disambiguation).
Corrupted platebody

The corrupted platebody is an item introduced during the Christmas corrupt cluefest, obtained by speaking to Horvik with a pestle and mortar and an air rune.

It has stats identical to that of an iron platebody. Unlike the iron platebody, however, it does not interfere with Ava's device.

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room, as part of the Corrupted armour set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

 Attack bonuses

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The platebody's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -10 to -15.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The corrupted platebody was discovered prior to the clue being released.[1]

References[edit | edit source]

The '''corrupted platebody''' is an item introduced during the [[Christmas corrupt cluefest]], obtained by speaking to [[Horvik]] with a [[pestle and mortar]] and an [[air rune]].

It has stats identical to that of an [[iron platebody]]. Unlike the iron platebody, however, it does not interfere with [[Ava's device]].
